checklist.title: Install Microsoft Outlook
checklist.description: Ensure Outlook is installed on your system
instructions: Launch Outlook and complete initial setup
Sign in with your Microsoft account

checklist.title: Set Window Size
checklist.description: Configure Outlook window for consistent layout
instructions: Set window to a standard size (preferably maximized)
Ensure main email view is visible

checklist.title: Verify Outlook is Ready
checklist.description: Ensure Outlook is ready for automation
instructions: Outlook should be on the main inbox view
Close any popup dialogs or notifications
